about_the_game:
Discover the ultimate experience with our exclusive Battle Pass on Steam! With this premium pass, you'll unlock a total of 113 skins, including 100 exclusive weapon skins ranging from common to legendary, plus 3 additional skins for your character. All you need to do to obtain them is play, level up, and check your inventory! Don't miss this opportunity to customize your arsenal and stand out on the battlefield. Get your Battle Pass now!





Weapons skins:
  • Damocles wood edition
  • Helios wood edition

Discover the ultimate experience with our exclusive Battle Pass on Steam! name: Master Arena - ULTIMATE PASS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core @ 2.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX660 or AMD Radeon HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core @ 4.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1060 or AMD Radeon RX580
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Discover the ultimate experience with our exclusive Battle Pass on Steam! Unlock 113 skins, including 100 exclusive weapon skins and 3 character skins. Customize your arsenal and stand out on the battlefield. Get your Battle Pass now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Japanese, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Korean, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
